# Basic functionality

```{r}
library(nhlapi)
playerIds <- c(8451101, 8458554)

# Get information on a specific player
nhl_retrieve_players(playerIds)

# Get a specific season statistics
nhl_retrieve_players_seasons(playerIds, "19961997")

# Get a specific season playoff statistics
nhl_retrieve_players_seasons(playerIds, "19961997", playoffs = TRUE)

# Get all season statistics for a player
nhl_retrieve_players_allseasons(playerIds)
```
